exec.arg: kill -TERM -$(ps aux | grep 'run.sh' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}')
sudo yum remove -y bahmni-openmrs bahmni-emr bahmni-web

ansible-playbook -i inventories/go-agent deploy.yml --extra-vars="environment_name=#{env_name} implementation_name=#{implementation_name} installer_location=#{installer_location} config_url=#{config_url} base_path=#{base_path} two_factor_auth=#{two_factor_auth} run_playbook_tests=#{run_playbook_tests} implementer_interface=#{implementer_interface}"
